description:
A warm, long sleeved jersey to suit smooth cornering and steady efforts on cold days. A full-length zipper lets you get the air flowing at the top of your climb, and highly efficient wicking keeps you dry and comfortable throughout your ride. The elasticized hem has a grippy finish for excellent stay-put power, and a dropped back hem provides coverage when you're in full tuck.

  • Made of cozy thermal fleece fabric for exceptional warmth and moisture transfer
  • Full length zipper offers easy venting
  • 3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker and a handful of gels
  • Drop back hem has a grippy finish for reliable coverage in the riding position
  • Reflective elements keep you visible
name: Pearl Izumi Quest Thermal Jersey - Women's
